msg.msgText: The following singleton configuration objects are supported: LogLevel Logging level of Default logs ConnectionLog Logging level of Connection logs SecurityLog Logging level of Security logs AdminLog Logging level of Administration logs MQConnectivityLog Logging level of MQConnectivity logs WebUIPort The Port to access IBM MessageSight WebUI WebUIHost The host IP address to access IBM MessageSight WebUI SSHHost The host IP address to access IBM MessageSight SSH Console FIPS Enable FIPS mode. PluginDebugServer The host IP address of the Plug-in server PluginRemoteDebugPort JVM debug port of the Plug-in server PluginMaxHeapSize JVM maximum heap size in megabytes of the Plug-in server EnableDiskPersistence Enable disk persistence SNMPEnabled Enable SNMP SNMPAgentAddress SNMP Agent IPaddresses

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
